Name: Mouse adventure
About the game: Adventure game, with elements of a 3D platformer. A cheese machine has broken down in the village, but the mechanic doesn't have enough money to buy spare parts for repairs. The mouse wants to help and goes in search of coins. The mouse will have to explore a variety of locations that are not similar to each other. Find many hiding places, overcome obstacles and dangerous places of varying difficulty. On the way, the mouse will meet various enemies and simple puzzles. If the mouse brings very few coins, the mechanic will not have enough money for repairs.
